publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1720 Marlyn Glen: Dundee Historic Environment Trust—That the Parliament welcomes the formation of the Dundee Historic Environment Trust and wholeheartedly supports its objective of renovating the communities of Dundee whilst protecting the city’s architectural heritage and improving its physical environment.
S2M-1720 Dundee Historic Environment Trust (lodged on 17 September 2004) Tommy Sheridan*
S2M-1720 Dundee Historic Environment Trust (lodged on 17 September 2004) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-1720 Dundee Historic Environment Trust (lodged on 17 September 2004) Elaine Smith*
